div.div: Parameters (slope and R 2) of the linear regression relationships between the warmth sum and the current year, i, NAO WI (i.e. no time-lag) for 116 successive 23-year periods.
div.p: Period 1 = 1878–1900; Period 116 = 1993–2015 (current study period). The relationships were significant ( P ≤ 0.05) in Periods 1 and 2, Periods 19 to 37 and 39, and Periods 49 to 84, 89 to 97, 101 and 102. The slopes of the relationships were all positive.
